resources.string: Art is a fantastic form to connect with people, and one of the most amazing ways to explore a new city. While there are tons of tour apps to specifically take you there, there is something different when you try and explore them yourself.

Cart-O is an app specifically made for explorers that like to go on an unexplored path.\n The ones who want to try new things and understand how a city is built and what makes the place tick! It is not designed to give you a specific route but will give you hints as to what you are going to look for and where you might find them.
Follow the arrows and faint lines on the map to orient yourself to some of the rare art pieces of Dresden and get to know this quaint little city a little better!
Welcome to the mapping world! Happy orienteering\n
